description:
Hang on a little longer. Nothing beats a grippy platform pedal when the trail is trying to toss you off. With 9 traction pins per side, you can charge through mud and crud. With 2 platform sizes to choose from, you maximize your power transfer and on-ride stability through each pedal stroke.

  • Composite platform is economical, durable and rigid with low profile (13mm thickness)
  • Broad platform provides stable surface area for efficient power transfer
  • Chromoly steel spindle stands up to trail abuse
  • Sealed bearings rotate smoothly through rain, mud and whatever
  • 9 hex traction pins per side for grip on the pedal
  • Recommended shoe sizes: Small (37-43 Eu) and Large (43-49 Eu)
  • Dimensions: Small (100 x 100mm) and Large (111 x 114mm)
name: Crankbrothers Stamp 1 Pedal
